namePublicShort.data: For vodka drinkers who take pride in what they drink, TILL’s American Wheat Vodka is distilled to deliver the uniquely smooth taste only Midwest craftsmanship can deliver.

description.data: Where you come from says a lot about you. Crafted by the expert distillery team at MGP, based in Atchison, Kansas, TILL Vodka is made by Kansans from the best premium heartland wheat and distilled using a proprietary process perfected for over 80 years. The result is a uniquely smooth, premium vodka that showcases the best of Midwest craftsmanship. TILL Vodka is named after the iconic tool, the Till, a symbol of hard work and pride. Gluten-free, vegan and kosher, TILL offers the perfect palate to bring the farm to your cocktail.

namePublicShort.data: The classic Stock® brand family are made specifically for sophisticated pallets. Available in Brandy, Red Vermouth and Extra Dry Vermouth.

description.data:
Italians are known for their spirit and charm. Sweet and strong, warm and refreshing, Stock 84 is perfectly balanced with undeniable character. Stock 84 - true Italian spirit.

Lionello Stock founded the company in Trieste in 1884 and developed what soon became a world renowned brand. Years later, to honour his legacy, Stock 84 was created. Based on the recipe from 1884 and
capturing the essence of Italian spirit -
indulgent, smooth and balanced.

Stock 84 was progressively refined by the most passionate master blenders, inspired by the original recipe but always attuned to contemporary breakthroughs.

Today Stock 84 is a smooth, drinkable spirit that fulfils the unique preferences of consumers from around the world. The new
recipe is easy on the palate, mellow and soft, retaining the genuine signature flavour of Stock 84.

Stock 84 is an ideal accompaniment for relaxing moments and informal gatherings with friends, just as Italians enjoy every day.

description.data:
Rebel Distiller’s Collection is handcrafted according to the original 1849 ‘wheated’ recipe from what would become the famous Stitzel-Weller Distillery, and then bottled at 113 proof to deliver a more complex flavor with a defiantly smooth finish.

Because each hand-picked barrel of Rebel Distiller’s Collection is unique, the exact flavor profile can vary from barrel to barrel.  However, the taste signature will generally consist of:

Appearance: Golden amber
Aroma: Notes of oak and Honey
Palate: Overtones of caramel & vanilla

namePublicShort.data: The classic Stock® brand family are made specifically for sophisticated pallets. Available in Brandy, Red Vermouth and Extra Dry Vermouth.

description.data:
Italians are known for their spirit and charm. Sweet and strong, warm and refreshing, Stock 84 is perfectly balanced with undeniable character. Stock 84 - true Italian spirit.

Lionello Stock founded the company in Trieste in 1884 and developed what soon became a world renowned brand. Years later, to honour his legacy, Stock 84 was created. Based on the recipe from 1884 and
capturing the essence of Italian spirit -
indulgent, smooth and balanced.

Stock 84 was progressively refined by the most passionate master blenders, inspired by the original recipe but always attuned to contemporary breakthroughs.

Today Stock 84 is a smooth, drinkable spirit that fulfils the unique preferences of consumers from around the world. The new
recipe is easy on the palate, mellow and soft, retaining the genuine signature flavour of Stock 84.

Stock 84 is an ideal accompaniment for relaxing moments and informal gatherings with friends, just as Italians enjoy every day.

The Glenlivet has been distilled for pleasure since 1824. Our founder, George Smith, believed whisky as the ultimate pleasure should be made unhurried, as time and care created the highest quality and flavoursome product. George’s innovative thinking, technique and the best ingredients created a whisky that set the standard for the region of Speyside.

description.data:
Révélation Grande Cuvée Cognac is the prestige expression of Grand Marnier with the most Cognac-forward taste. The extremely high cognac content brings exceptional depth and length to the palate. Designed for true cognac connoisseurs and spirits enthusiasts, this elegant liquor uses only the finest XXO cognacs, exclusively selected from Grande Champagne, and orange liqueur.

Grand Marnier famously created the audacious blend of cognac and Bigaradia orange essence back in 1880. Révélation elevates this assemblage, by using XXO Cognac and only a dash of the unique Bigaradia orange essence: the oranges are picked green to ensure the highest concentration. The spirit’s harmonious blend of up to 75 eaux-de-vie is a true tribute to the craftsmanship of the previous Master Blender, Patrick Raguenaud. He created this complicated balance relying only on his nose, without sweet flavor elements to determine consistency.

Révélation is a spirit intricately built as a fragrance. The ultimate journey of senses is the creation of the French perfumer Marie Le Febvre. Initiate the serving ritual with a cognac sniffer glass & a hypnotic swirl that slowly oxygenates the spirit to amplify its delicate alchemy. The fresh and vivid notes of the bigaradia orange first come to the nose; it contrasts and harmonizes with the walnut and vanilla aspects the Cognac has picked up from the wood casks.

Serve Révélation neat or on the rocks. To bring out the bigaradia orange, rub caramelized orange peel oil along the edge of the glass, adding further depth to a memorable experience.

This exquisite spirit comes in a refined bottle that tells the Grand Marnier story in a contemporary way. The glass stopper recreates the iconic ribbon as a sculpture plunging into the liquid, creating an elegant collector’s item.

description.data:
This limited release cuvée is crafted with exceptionally rare cognacs from the Grand Marnier private family cellar, exclusively from Grande Champagne, and Bigaradia orange finely macerated in cognac. 140 years after the creation of the disruptive recipe marrying cognac and Bigaradia orange essence, Quintessence brings together Grand Marnier’s oldest reserves, elevating this signature assemblage to its ultimate expression.

Everything in Quintessence is conceived as a tribute to the origin of the brand: The recipe inspired by the brand archives, the cognac bringing together the oldest family reserves, and the elegant handmade crystal carafe created by Maison Baccarat, echoing old Grand Marnier bottles.

namePublicShort.data: Sonic Archeology

description.data: The 1920s saw the combination and convergence of several genres of American music to be the foundation for Rock & Roll. At the same time prohibition sparked a boom of cocktailing in bustling speakeasys throughout the country. Sonic Archeology is Dogfish Head's liquid tribute to the blending of sounds and spirits, a ready to drink bottled cocktail inspired by the roaring '20s and reimagined for today. Sonic Archeology combines a trifecta of spirits and real fruit juices to create flavors of balanced sweetness and tropical fruits, lemon and a pleasant oak character. Just pour over ice and enjoy as the perfect evening cocktail. 25% alc./vol.

brandHighlight.data: PATRÓN tequilas are handcrafted at the Hacienda Patrón distillery in Jalisco, Mexico where people are the heart of the process - one that has remained the same since the very beginning. First, skilled jimadors uproot only the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave with the perfect sugar content and transport the heart of the plant to Hacienda Patrón. They’re then hand chopped, baked and crushed by a two-ton volcanic stone tahona wheel and a roller mill. The agave is then fermented in pine oak tanks and distilled in small batches using copper stills. Each bottle of PATRÓN is a work of art, meticulously inspected, hand corked and signed.

description.data:
Introducing PATRÓN AHUMADO REPOSADO
100% Weber Blue agave cooked over charcoal for a smooth and smoky taste. PATRÓN AHUMADO is the perfect balance of smoky taste with a smooth finish creating an undeniably sophisticated tequila. To appreciate this unique liquid, this is best enjoyed neat, on the rocks or in a classic cocktail like an old fashioned.

They’re then hand chopped, baked and crushed by a two-ton volcanic stone tahona wheel and a roller mill. The agave is then fermented in pine oak tanks and distilled in small batches using copper stills. Each bottle of PATRÓN is a work of art, meticulously inspected, hand corked and signed.

To appreciate this unique liquid, this is best enjoyed neat, on the rocks or in a classic cocktail like a margarita.

brandHighlight.data: A love of gin and a reverence for tradition. No. 209 Gin and San Francisco are a natural fit. They not only share a reverence for tradition and a passion for the best, but also a confident push-the-boundaries attitude that encourages risk-taking and daring innovation. Built on San Francisco’s Pier 50, the natural cooling properties of 13 feet of San Francisco Bay water beneath the pier keeps the air temperature in the distillery perfect for distilling year-round. We’ve traveled the globe and researched the best practices in distilling to produce a vodka with delicious complexity and smoothness.

description.data: Kosher dietary law prohibits the consumption of leavened grains, and spirits fermented from grains, during Passover. No. 209 Kosher-for-Passover Vodka is crafted using a Passover-certified sugarcane base spirit to create a vodka with a surprising sweetness across the palate and a dry, clean finish. In order to receive the loftier “Kosher-for-Passover” designation, Distillery No. 209 enlists the assistance of the Orthodox Union to supervise and certify the vodka’s production at the Pier 50 facility in San Francisco.

description.data: A love of gin and a reverence for tradition. No. 209 Gin and San Francisco are a natural fit. They not only share a reverence for tradition and a passion for the best, but also a confident push-the-boundaries attitude. Vastly different from the juniper-heavy gins of the past, No. 209 opens with a beautifully aromatic nose of predominately citrus and floral notes with a hint of spiciness. As the spirit warms in the mouth, delicate floral notes are liberated from the bergamot and coriander. Mid-palate, there is a pepper-like warmth from the emerging cardamom and juniper. As the cardamom continues to bloom across the palate mint-like components further emerge. The cassia and other warm spice notes become prominent on the finish.

tastingNotesText.data: Aromatics of citrus and floral notes and spiciness. As the spirit warms in the mouth notes of bergamot and coriander evolve. Mid-palate, there is cardamom and juniper. The cassia and other warm spice notes become prominent on the finish.

brandHighlight.data: A casual conversation between some innovative winemakers sparked an idea to mellow whiskey in seasoned wine barrels. It would prove to be the beginnings of The Splinter Group. Being both intensely curious and insanely competitive (as winemakers tend to be), we set out to make the greatest whiskey - uniquely made by people who make great wine. The rest is history.

description.data: A casual conversation between the Wilkinson family and renowned winemaker, Dave Phinney sparked an idea to mellow whiskey in seasoned wine barrels. Thus, the beginnings of The Splinter Group. The Slaughter House Whiskey is intense and inviting with caramelized sugar, baking spices, dark fruits, butterscotch and vanilla notes. The palate is smooth, ultra rich and layered. The finish is impressive with honey, toast and loads of caramel.

description.data: Garrison Brothers Distillery proudly introduces Lady Bird Bourbon, a 114-proof Texas straight bourbon whiskey that showcases the finest elements of craftsmanship and flavor. Starting with our award-winning Texas Straight Bourbon Whiskey, we delicately infuse it with Burleson's Texas Wildflower Honey, creating a harmonious blend of natural sweetness and complexity. Master Distiller Donnis Todd, in collaboration with Nancy Garrison, meticulously finishes this unique bourbon in French Cognac XO casks, imparting a rich elegance and depth to the final product. Lady Bird Bourbon is a tribute to the inspiring legacy of Lady Bird Johnson, and as a commitment to preserving the natural beauty of North America, $5 from every bottle sold goes to the Lady Bird Johnson Wildflower Center. The end result is a high-proof, luxurious sipper with a delectable balance of honey and cognac notes, perfect for savoring and celebrating the art of fine bourbon-making. Drink Like An Adult. 57% Alc./Vol. (114 Proof). Cooked, distilled, barreled, and bottled by Garrison Brothers® Distillery, Hye, Texas 78635.

namePublicLong.data: Garrison Brothers Lady Bird Texas Straight Bourbon Whiskey Infused with Honey & Finished in Cognac Casks, 750ml Bottle, 114 Proof

tastingNotesText.data: Our Lady Bird Bourbon greets you with the inviting aroma of freshly cut grass and sweet honey accompanied by subtle notes of black cocoa waffle cone and honey wafers, creating a warm and enticing experience. As you take your first sip, true decadence unfolds on the palate: the rich taste of warm buckwheat pancakes, dark chocolate-covered cherries and malted milk balls. The complex profile also includes the indulgent essence of cognac cherries, dried figs and plums, offering a luxuriously unique tasting experience. The finish is long and satisfying; lingering on the tongue, leaving a lasting impression of the succulence derived from the harmonious marriage of honey and cognac flavors.

text.data: A harmonious blend of award-winning bourbon, Texas wildflower honey and French Cognac XO casks.
Cooked, distilled, barreled, and bottled at Garrison Brothers Distillery

$5 from every bottle sold is donated to the Lady Bird Johnson Wildflower Center to support their mission of protecting and preserving native plants and landscapes.

description.data: Mayenda Tequila is a rich, complex and elegant ultra-premium sipping tequila made using a pioneering process, which adds two extra steps of craft and care to extract flavors from the heart of the agave.  Crafted at Casa San Nicolas, in Arandas, Jalisco by Maestro Tequilero, Jesus Susunaga and his team. Each bottle of this small-batch high-end tequila is produced with the aim of capturing the aromatic, caramelized agave notes that are typically lost in the production process. The result is a unique, agave-forward sipping experience with new and unexplored flavors from the agave. This ultra-premium tequila offers aromas of honey, cinnamon, and orange blossom, followed by caramelized agave notes on the palate with notes of citrus, honey, and baking spices at the finish. Mayenda Tequila Blanco is best enjoyed at room temperature as a neat serve. For a richer, more intense tasting experience, serve alongside both a raw and roasted wedge of pineapple dipped in pink Himalayan salt. Take a small bite of the raw wedge of pineapple, followed by a sip of Mayenda Tequila, and repeat the same for the roasted pineapple to note the different flavors and aromas that each bring out in the tequila.

description.data:
Quintessence Grande Cuvée is the ultimate masterpiece of Maison Grand Marnier. Extremely rare & inspired by the brand’s origins, Quintessence embodies pure luxury. Its unrivalled elegance and exclusivity are elevated by the handcrafted Baccarat crystal carafe. With only 1,000 bottles in circulation, the Grand Marnier Cognac becomes a true masterpiece.

This extraordinary spirit is based on a century-old recipe found in the brand archives: Bigaradia oranges are macerated in Cognac and double distilled, yielding a drink richer, more full-bodied and complex than ever before. This limited release Grande Cuvée is crafted with the rarest and oldest hors d’âge cognacs, exclusively from Grande Champagne, including a 70 years old vintage from the Marnier Lapostolle private family cellar. A true tribute to the craftsmanship of the Master Blender Patrick Raguenaud.

Quintessence is a spirit intricately built as a fragrance. The ultimate journey of senses is the creation of the French perfumer Marie Le Febvre. The deep copper color initiates the serving ritual. Fresh lemony facets & orange, complex woody notes, walnut and luminous dry apricot culminate in a vibrant and lively finish of spicy cinnamon & dark vanilla. Serve Quintessence neat, in a crystal cognac sniffer glass: a hypnotic swirl slowly oxygenates the spirit to amplify its delicate alchemy. Pair it with chocolate for an immersive experience. 

Maison Baccarat and Grand Marnier once again reignited their passion for French excellence. Each crystal carafe is handcrafted and unique. Its hypnotic, never-ending twist of crystal pays homage to the brand’s iconic ribbon. The drop-shaped decanter and the crystal podium complement the excellence of the liquid. The unique Gift Box with mirrors inside creates an interplay of reflections designed to stage the bottle.

Grand Marnier Quintessence Cognac is a pure expression of heritage & ultimate beauty. A liquid so rare, savoring it becomes an unforgettable experience.

Martell VS offers a rich aromatic experience. Remarkably smooth and fruity, this cognac is the perfect addition to any cocktail.

The elegance, complexity and balance of the Martell style are the result of a unique savoir-faire: the distillation of clear wines only and the ageing of its eaux-de-vie in fine-grain oak barrels. Founded in 1715, Martell is the oldest of the great Cognac Houses. Maison Martell is renowned throughout the world for the finesse and elegance of its cognacs, the result of a legacy of savoir-faire handed down through nine generations. Together with a passion for its craft and a profound attachment to the terroir, Maison Martell is defined by the audacity with which it has challenged convention to create new expressions of cognac, including the icon Martell Cordon Bleu in 1912 and the creation of Blue Swift, the first time VSOP cognac is aged in bourbon casks. The free spirit of the House is symbolized by its historic emblem: the swift.

At the very heart of the Chivas Regal blend lies the exceptional Strathisla single malt and a story of enduring brotherhood, craftsmanship and generosity of spirit. A gentle reminder of these qualities of love and loyalty – two coupled hearts and a crown – is forged into the gates that welcome you to our distillery deep in the Scottish Highlands. This is a tribute to the enduring commitment of our founding brothers, James and John Chivas, to craft the world’s finest blended scotch whiskies. Every drop of Chivas Regal 12 Years Old is expertly blended to create a superior whisky with luxurious notes of honey, hazelnut and butterscotch.

Established in California in the late 1970s, Mumm Napa draws from the rich heritage of Champagne Mumm of Reims, France while integrating a unique Napa Valley style to make internationally respected wines of excellent quality. Ludovic Dervin carries on the inspiration that began with Guy Devaux in making Mumm Napa wines, bringing the ripe character of Napa fruit to the forefront while maintaining the classic balance and structure necessary in an outstanding sparkling wine. Mumm Napa is the only sparkling wine with a Napa AVA.

Founded in 1811 by Nicolas Perrier and Adèle Jouët. The foundation of the estate, located in Épernay, has always been chardonnay. The maison owns 65 hectares of vineyards, 99.2% of which is Grand Cru, including sites in the Côte des Blancs - Cramant and Avize. This cuvée is inspired by the historic Blason de France (1955-1990), Perrier-Jouët’s first prestige bottling, in partnership with Relais & Chateau, offered only in the finest restaurants worldwide. The bottle’s slender neck and slight taper are modeled after this original cuvée.

namePublicShort.data: Crafted by the renowned Chivas Brothers, Royal Salute 21 is a smooth blended scotch aged for at least 21 years. This premium Scotch whisky comes in a stunning glass flagon that celebrates the tradition of the 21-gun salute.

description.data: Crafted by the renowned Chivas Brothers, Royal Salute 21 is a smooth blended scotch aged for at least 21 years. This premium Scotch whisky comes in a stunning glass flagon that celebrates the tradition of the 21-gun salute.

tastingNotesText.data:
Taste: Full, deep fruity flavors with a subtle smokiness. The first taste of Royal Salute brings the subtleties of the nose to life. Sumptuous sweet orange marmalade flavors infused with fresh pears burst across the tongue. The second taste brings in a rich medley of spices and a nuttiness of hazelnuts that have a mouth-filling intensity and then the final warmth from hints of masculine smokiness.
Nose: Rich, fruity aromas and sweet fragrance of autumn flowers. Powerful aromas of sweet pears and citrus fruits are balanced with the full fragrance of autumn flowers. Elegant aromas of sweet vanilla and a dry oakiness are enhanced with subtle notes of sherry and smoke.

text.data: Crafted by the renowned Chivas Brothers, Royal Salute 21 is a smooth blended scotch aged for at least 21 years. This premium Scotch whisky comes in a stunning glass flagon that celebrates the tradition of the 21-gun salute.

Royal Salute was created to mark the Coronation of Queen Elizabeth II in 1953 and combines timeless tradition with the instinctive skill of the craftsman. Only whiskies that have slowly blossomed in the cask for at least 21 years are eligible. Only the finest are chosen. Only the skill of the Master Blender can tease out their truest beauty.

Kenwood Vineyards was established in 1970 in the former Pagani Brothers Winery, a historic cellar dating back to 1906. Thoroughly refurbished and modernized, the facility now boasts more than 125 stainless steel fermenting tanks and large oak uprights, and 20,000 small French and American oak barrels, all devoted to Kenwood Vineyards’ “small lot” style of winemaking.

The elegance, complexity and balance of the Martell style are the result of a unique savoir-faire: the distillation of clear wines only and the ageing of its eaux-de-vie in fine-grain oak barrels. Founded in 1715, Martell is the oldest of the great Cognac Houses. Maison Martell is renowned throughout the world for the finesse and elegance of its cognacs, the result of a legacy of savoir-faire handed down through nine generations. Together with a passion for its craft and a profound attachment to the terroir, Maison Martell is defined by the audacity with which it has challenged convention to create new expressions of cognac, including the icon Martell Cordon Bleu in 1912 and the creation of Blue Swift, the first time VSOP cognac is aged in bourbon casks. The free spirit of the House is symbolized by its historic emblem: the swift.

Smooth Ambler Spirits set out to produce fine artisan spirits by combining patient Appalachian know-how with the finest of American ingredients. Located in the rural Greenbrier Valley of West Virginia, Smooth Ambler uses state-of-the-art distillery equipment in conjunction with the natural resources of the region; high-valley mountain air, natural waters, ideal temperature variations and friendly folks. The result is a truly remarkable crafted drink.

text.data: Mix up a batch of margaritas; pour yourself a sweet and tangy Paloma with Olmeca Altos Plata's fruity and grassy flavors

Made with 100 percent blue agave from the Los Altos region of Mexico and distilled at nearly 7,000 feet above sea level, Altos Plata is a sweet and citric tequila with a classic taste that won't disappoint.

Created in 2009, our Maestro Tequilero Jesús Hernández teamed up with two of the world´s most recognized bartenders: Henry Besant  and Andrés Masso to create Altos tequila. Searching for a 100% agave tequila for craft cocktails at an affordable price, they created a high quality, agave-rich tequila good enough to sip or to mix in a cocktail.

Founded in 1997, Jefferson’s is the brainchild of Trey Zoeller and his father Chet, a famed bourbon historian. They were continuing a family whiskey tradition that goes back to Trey’s 8th generation grandmother who was arrested in 1799 for the “production and sales of spirituous liquors.” His curious and experimental mindset has allowed him to push the boundaries of bourbon whiskey. Upholding tradition, yet always discovering new possibilities.

Just two Master Distillers have had the privilege of preserving the legacy of the world’s most sought-after Irish Whiskey. Created in 1984 by Master Distiller Emeritus Barry Crockett, Midleton Very Rare is the ultimate expression of his art and expertise. Once a year, Master Distiller, Brian Nation honours Barry’s vision by handpicking the finest and rarest whiskeys available and carefully blends them to create each annual vintage of Midleton Very Rare.Only a select number of casks are deemed of sufficient excellence and rarity to bear the Midleton Very Rare name, making this The Pinnacle of Irish Whiskey.

At the very heart of the Chivas Regal blend lies the exceptional Strathisla single malt and a story of enduring brotherhood, craftsmanship and generosity of spirit. A gentle reminder of these qualities of love and loyalty – two coupled hearts and a crown – is forged into the gates that welcome you to our distillery deep in the Scottish Highlands. This is a tribute to the enduring commitment of our founding brothers, James and John Chivas, to craft the world’s finest blended scotch whiskies. Every drop of Chivas Regal 12 Years Old is expertly blended to create a superior whisky with luxurious notes of honey, hazelnut and butterscotch.

Founded in 1811 by Nicolas Perrier and Adèle Jouët. The foundation of the estate, located in Épernay, has always been chardonnay. The maison owns 65 hectares of vineyards, 99.2% of which is Grand Cru, including sites in the Côte des Blancs - Cramant and Avize. This cuvée is inspired by the historic Blason de France (1955-1990), Perrier-Jouët’s first prestige bottling, in partnership with Relais & Chateau, offered only in the finest restaurants worldwide. The bottle’s slender neck and slight taper are modeled after this original cuvée.

Our straight bourbon is uniquely and distinctly Texan because it highlights the impact of Texas terroir. Made exclusively from grains grown in Texas and fermented with a proprietary yeast sourced from a Texas pecan nut, this bourbon demonstrates true Texas flavors.

TX Whiskey is a premier brand with an artisanal distillery, connecting and inspiring people through whiskey. Located in Fort Worth, TX, the brand’s Whiskey Ranch proudly sits on 112 acres of historic golf grounds making it one of the largest whiskey distilleries. With a mission to create innovative whiskeys and extraordinary experiences, the brand launched its first expression TX Blended Whiskey in June 2012, receiving both “Double Gold” and “Best American Craft Whiskey” honors at the 2013 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. As the first distillery to use a proprietary combination of grains, yeast, and barrel toasting, the brand continued to be an industry innovator with the release of TX Straight Bourbon in 2016. The single-farm sourced expression showcases the unique terroir and flavors of North Texas receiving Gold Medal honors twice in 2020 in the “Small Batch – Up to 5 Years” category at both the San Francisco World Spirits Competition and International Spirits Challenge in England. Additionally, it was awarded a 94 rating in the 2020 Ultimate Spirits Challenge and a Silver Medal at the PR%F Awards. Additional TX Whiskey expressions, including TX Bourbon Port Finish, TX Bourbon Sherry Finish and TX Bourbon Bottled-In-Bond Single Barrel were recently awarded Double Gold and Gold medals at the 2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition.

brandHighlight.data: Founded in 1846 by John Dewar, DEWAR'S has grown from a small wine and spirits merchant shop in Scotland, to one of the largest Scotch whisky brands in the world.  Best known for its iconic DEWAR'S White Label, it has expanded its family to create a portfolio of premium and super premium whiskies including DEWAR'S 12 Year Old, DEWAR'S 15 Year Old, DEWAR'S 18 Year Old, the exclusive DEWAR'S Signature and most recently DEWAR'S Scratched Cask. These whiskies are crafted using the DEWAR'S oak marrying ageing process. Pioneered by DEWAR'S in 1899, it involves returning the hand-crafted blend to vintage oak casks for further maturation. The result is a smoother taste with a long, lingering finish; a taste that wins medals and applause, making DEWAR'S the world's most awarded blended Scotch.

description.data: The iconic Dewar's White Label is a timeless Scotch whisky that tastes as full and round today as it did over a century ago when it was created by our first Master Blender, A.J. Cameron. Dewar's White Label contains around 40 of Scotland’s finest single malts, with Aberfeldy at its heart. It is rich, golden and mellow throughout.

awardPrizeList.awardPrizeNameText: In the words of renowned whisky critic, Jim Murray, DEWAR'S SIGNATURE is, "an outstanding addition to the highest echelons of blended Scotch".

brandHighlight.data: Founded in 1846 by John Dewar, DEWAR'S has grown from a small wine and spirits merchant shop in Scotland, to one of the largest Scotch whisky brands in the world.  Best known for its iconic DEWAR'S White Label, it has expanded its family to create a portfolio of premium and super premium whiskies including DEWAR'S 12 Year Old, DEWAR'S 15 Year Old, DEWAR'S 18 Year Old, the exclusive DEWAR'S Signature and most recently DEWAR'S Scratched Cask. These whiskies are crafted using the DEWAR'S oak marrying ageing process. Pioneered by DEWAR'S in 1899, it involves returning the hand-crafted blend to vintage oak casks for further maturation. The result is a smoother taste with a long, lingering finish; a taste that wins medals and applause, making DEWAR'S the world's most awarded blended Scotch.

description.data: The culmination of more than 150 years of blending tradition, yet few will ever be privileged to experience a whisky this sublime, this rarefied and this complex. Each bottle is numbered by hand and carries the Dewar signature and, with it, the reputation of generations.

tastingNotesText.data: Deep golden amber. Rich, fruity and mellow with notes of rich fruits and honey with vanilla and toffee overtones. Sweet and extremely smooth with a creamy texture mouth feel, vanilla, honey and caramel notes. Full bodied, long and pleasant with a slightly dry finish.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

DEWAR'S SIGNATURE is the masterpiece blend of whisky virtuoso, Tom Aitken, one of only 6 people to ever hold the title of Master Blender at Dewar's.
It is the perfect evolution of the DEWAR'S portfolio, a richly unique yet representative expression of DEWAR'S WHITE LABEL and DEWAR'S 12.
At the heart of DEWAR'S Signature is an exceptional Aberfeldy single malt whisky of great age, with notes of heather and honey.
The end result is an exquisitely balanced blend accented with notes of honeyed heather and sweet smoke indicative of serious aging.

brandHighlight.data: February 4, 1862. The Bacardí family, led by Don Facundo Bacardí Massó, buy a distillery in Santiago de Cuba. They throw away the rule book and make their own unique blends with a revolutionary rum-making process that would change the way rum was made forever. One family - over 150 years of rum-making expertise.

description.data: Created in 1862, BACARDÍ Reserva Ocho rum is one of the oldest private rum blends in the world. For seven generations, the Bacardí family enjoyed it as their personal reserve. Happily, today everyone can enjoy this golden sipping rum and create special moments together.

tastingNotesText.data: BACARDÍ Reserva Ocho rum boasts warming notes of butterscotch, nutmeg and dried apricots. Longer aging brings out additional complexity of flavors from the barrel and develops a rich body with velvety smoothness. Rich mahogany in hue.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

BACARDI Reserva Ocho Rum
Aged in American white oak barrels and filtered through charcoal for a distinctive smoothness
This aged rum offers a smooth, complex taste that’s easy to casually sip and enjoy
This BACARDI rum delivers a deep, layered and mellow flavor of dried fruits, spices and oaky vanilla
Enjoy this hard liquor neat, on the rocks, or mix into a cocktail like an Old Fashioned, Rum Negroni or Old Cuban

brandHighlight.data: PATRÓN tequilas are handcrafted at the Hacienda Patrón distillery in Jalisco, Mexico where people are the heart of the process - one that has remained the same since the very beginning. First, skilled jimadors uproot only the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave with the perfect sugar content and transport the heart of the plant to Hacienda Patrón. They’re then hand chopped, baked and crushed by a two-ton volcanic stone tahona wheel and a roller mill. The agave is then fermented in pine oak tanks and distilled in small batches using copper stills. Each bottle of PATRÓN is a work of art, meticulously inspected, hand corked and signed.

brandHighlight.data: CRAIGELLACHIE is the rock at the heart of Speyside, yet is anything but your typical 'Speyside' whisky. Considered old fashioned even in 1891, its muscular robustness comes from the use of oil fired malt and worm tub condensers. It is this full, yet aromatic, character that has made CRAIGELLACHIE a prized malt for blending since the late 19th century.

description.data: Speyside whiskies are known to be fruity and floral, but as the bad boy of Speyside, Craigellachie defies with its oil fired, rich character. Craigellachie 13 is matured in a mixture of ex-bourbon and ex-sherry casks. The bourbon casks bring vanilla, toffee and fudge notes to the fore, and the sherry casks provide richness and complexity.

namePublicShort.data: W LAWSON'S FINEST BLEND

pictureTypeCode.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.
pictureTypeCode.label: Product Image

brandHighlight.data:
William Lawson’s aka The Highlander’s attitude towards life was NO RULES. And creating a damn fine drink, GREAT SCOTCH. From the countless tales we know he was different. They say ‘polite society’ wasn’t exactly his natural home. The millions of rules and ‘proper’ ways of doing things always puzzled him. The biggest mystery though to Lawson… “Why does good whisky have to be so bloody snobbish and cost the earth?” The sniffing, swilling, talking about notes of fruit and leather… Rubbish! Handcrafted? All whisky is handcrafted, try making it without hands! Aged 20 years in an old barrel? That doesn’t make it a better whisky! 
So it’s said he made his own whisky, as simple and rule-breaking as he was. The result: True Highlander spirit, in a bottle. Inspired by William’s legacy we still make our scotch in Macduff, and we make it our way. You won’t find Macduff Distillery on a postcard, it wasn’t built to be pretty, it was built to make Great Scotch. Scotch with teeth… and balls. Forged, not crafted. Big, bold and absolutely no smoke… This scotch is for drinking. However you damn well want! Straight or with cola. Heck, try it with apple juice… it doesn’t matter! WILLIAM LAWSON'S is perfectly balanced. Like Great Scotch should be.

description.data: The rulebook. It’s something William Lawson never had a use for. Except as a doorstop. Or for swotting midges (they grow big around here). Because the whisky he created in 1849 did things differently. It used Scottish malts, but none of the peat or smoke of more traditional Scotch. Even today, unlike the rest, we ferment our Macduff Glen Deveron single malt for a short time and distill it fast. Then blend it with strong malts and grain whiskies for a big, bold flavour. Yes, we still do things our way, nobody else’s. William himself would approve.

brandHighlight.data: Founded in 1846 by John Dewar, DEWAR'S has grown from a small wine and spirits merchant shop in Scotland, to one of the largest Scotch whisky brands in the world.  Best known for its iconic DEWAR'S White Label, it has expanded its family to create a portfolio of premium and super premium whiskies including DEWAR'S 12 Year Old, DEWAR'S 15 Year Old, DEWAR'S 18 Year Old, the exclusive DEWAR'S Signature and most recently DEWAR'S Scratched Cask. These whiskies are crafted using the DEWAR'S oak marrying ageing process. Pioneered by DEWAR'S in 1899, it involves returning the hand-crafted blend to vintage oak casks for further maturation. The result is a smoother taste with a long, lingering finish; a taste that wins medals and applause, making DEWAR'S the world's most awarded blended Scotch.

description.data: Dewar's 18 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky is a blend of very rare vintage single malt and single grain Scotch whiskies, hence the nickname, “The Vintage.” Each bottle includes whiskies from the five single malt distilleries owned by John Dewar and Sons. The whiskies are then married in vintage oak casks. This special blend is creamy with notes of honey and marzipan.

tastingNotesText.data: A masterpiece of Dewar's® Master Blender Tom Aitken, Dewar's 18 Year Old Founders Reserve Scotch Whisky is a creamy, full and well-rounded blended whisky. This blended scotch whisky is laced with a rich body of dark chocolate flavor, and a dried fruit finish. Finished in selected oak casks

brandHighlight.data:
GREY GOOSE Vodka is created in France, a country renowned for its craftsmanship, epicurean traditions and spirit-making heritage. The French have a deeply ingrained culture of terroir - identifying the ideal combination of quality food and drink ingredients with people, process and place. Therefore, they have an innate understanding of how to get the best out of the best. Francois Thibault, the creator of GREY GOOSE, was inspired by his training as a Cognac cellar master and created a vodka designed to express the true taste and character of the ingredients. Francois still oversees every step of the unique journey from field to bottle.
GREY GOOSE Vodka is 100% traceable from crop to cork. Every step, from harvest to milling to distillation to bottling, using the traditions of the Maitre de Chai. Some of our farmers have worked the land going back 11 generations. Only two ingredients are used: single-origin Picardie winter wheat and natural spring water.  The inside of every bottle is washed once with GREY GOOSE, so it’s the only liquid ever touching the bottle.

description.data: Grey Goose Vodka is a premium vodka, born of an extraordinary passion for spirit-making. It is created using only the finest French ingredients – the highest-grade wheat and pristine limestone-filtered spring water. It is a spirit of uncommon brilliance, unrivaled craftsmanship and signature smoothness and is an excellent choice as a gift.

tastingNotesText.data: Grey Goose Vodka has an exquisite clear, fresh and elegantly aromatic taste. This is a premium vodka of unparalleled smoothness and exceptional taste, with subtle hints of almond and a long, satisfying finish.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

GREY GOOSE Vodka
A high quality hard liquor that allows you to effortlessly enjoy on any occasion when you want an exquisitely flavorful experience
Combining the best ingredients from France, such as soft winter wheat and Gensac spring water to deliver a delicate and floral aroma
80 proof vodka that is distilled only once to preserve the integrity of the taste
Extraordinary vodka with a sweet, round palette and a bold, toffee finish

flavorStatement.data: Grey Goose Vodka has an exquisite clear, fresh and elegantly aromatic taste. This is a premium vodka of unparalleled smoothness and exceptional taste, with subtle hints of almond and a long, satisfying finish.

brandHighlight.data: Founded in 1846 by John Dewar, DEWAR'S has grown from a small wine and spirits merchant shop in Scotland, to one of the largest Scotch whisky brands in the world.  Best known for its iconic DEWAR'S White Label, it has expanded its family to create a portfolio of premium and super premium whiskies including DEWAR'S 12 Year Old, DEWAR'S 15 Year Old, DEWAR'S 18 Year Old, the exclusive DEWAR'S Signature and most recently DEWAR'S Scratched Cask. These whiskies are crafted using the DEWAR'S oak marrying ageing process. Pioneered by DEWAR'S in 1899, it involves returning the hand-crafted blend to vintage oak casks for further maturation. The result is a smoother taste with a long, lingering finish; a taste that wins medals and applause, making DEWAR'S the world's most awarded blended Scotch.

description.data: Dewar's 12 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky was created by the eponymous Dewar family. It is famous for its double-aged blend, with six months of marrying in oak casks after initial maturation and blending. This Scotch whisky's unique taste and experience is one of the world’s most popular and awarded whiskies

namePublicShort.data: W LAWSON'S FINEST BLEND

pictureTypeCode.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.
pictureTypeCode.label: Product Image

brandHighlight.data:
William Lawson’s aka The Highlander’s attitude towards life was NO RULES. And creating a damn fine drink, GREAT SCOTCH. From the countless tales we know he was different. They say ‘polite society’ wasn’t exactly his natural home. The millions of rules and ‘proper’ ways of doing things always puzzled him. The biggest mystery though to Lawson… “Why does good whisky have to be so bloody snobbish and cost the earth?” The sniffing, swilling, talking about notes of fruit and leather… Rubbish! Handcrafted? All whisky is handcrafted, try making it without hands! Aged 20 years in an old barrel? That doesn’t make it a better whisky! 
So it’s said he made his own whisky, as simple and rule-breaking as he was. The result: True Highlander spirit, in a bottle. Inspired by William’s legacy we still make our scotch in Macduff, and we make it our way. You won’t find Macduff Distillery on a postcard, it wasn’t built to be pretty, it was built to make Great Scotch. Scotch with teeth… and balls. Forged, not crafted. Big, bold and absolutely no smoke… This scotch is for drinking. However you damn well want! Straight or with cola. Heck, try it with apple juice… it doesn’t matter! WILLIAM LAWSON'S is perfectly balanced. Like Great Scotch should be.

description.data: The rulebook. It’s something William Lawson never had a use for. Except as a doorstop. Or for swotting midges (they grow big around here). Because the whisky he created in 1849 did things differently. It used Scottish malts, but none of the peat or smoke of more traditional Scotch. Even today, unlike the rest, we ferment our Macduff Glen Deveron single malt for a short time and distill it fast. Then blend it with strong malts and grain whiskies for a big, bold flavour. Yes, we still do things our way, nobody else’s. William himself would approve.

pictureTypeCode.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.
pictureTypeCode.label: Product Image

brandHighlight.data:
GREY GOOSE Vodka is created in France, a country renowned for its craftsmanship, epicurean traditions and spirit-making heritage. The French have a deeply ingrained culture of terroir - identifying the ideal combination of quality food and drink ingredients with people, process and place. Therefore, they have an innate understanding of how to get the best out of the best. Francois Thibault, the creator of GREY GOOSE, was inspired by his training as a Cognac cellar master and created a vodka designed to express the true taste and character of the ingredients. Francois still oversees every step of the unique journey from field to bottle.
GREY GOOSE Vodka is 100% traceable from crop to cork. Every step, from harvest to milling to distillation to bottling, using the traditions of the Maitre de Chai. Some of our farmers have worked the land going back 11 generations. Only two ingredients are used: single-origin Picardie winter wheat and natural spring water.  The inside of every bottle is washed once with GREY GOOSE, so it’s the only liquid ever touching the bottle.

description.data: GREY GOOSE VX Premium Vodka is an exclusive edition of GREY GOOSE Vodka. It represents the pinnacle of the GREY GOOSE Cellar Master's expertise, and establishes a new standard in vodka brands. Enjoy it on special occasions or give it as an exquisite, well-chosen gift.

tastingNotesText.data: GREY GOOSE® VX Premium Vodka is a pioneering new spirit born of the world's best-tasting French vodka. Only exceptional vodka ingredients are used to give Grey Goose® VX Premium Vodka its rich character. No other premium vodka enjoys this complexity with its hints of white fruit blossom, plum, apricot, light citrus and wild honey and its long, lingering finish. Together, they deliver a truly unique and luxurious experience.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

GREY GOOSE VX Premium Vodka is an exclusive edition found only in iconic airports and select locations around the world.
When GREY GOOSE Vodka is masterfully crafted with a hint of precious cognac, a pioneering new spirit is born.
Cellar Master François Thibault validates the quality of every batch of grey goose Vodka.
The water used in GREY GOOSE is naturally filtered through underground limestone so deep it is untouched by pollutants.
The soft winter wheat used in GREY GOOSE Vodka is the same high quality wheat used in famous French breads and pastries.

brandHighlight.data: Aultmore distillery was founded in 1897 by Alexander Edward, one of Scotland’s best-known distillers, during the peak of the late-Victorian whisky boom. Supplied to the big blending houses of the day, AULTMORE® single malt’s popularity with them gave rise to the distillery’s success, which drew great admiration for the smoothness of its spirit. In fact, its qualities are so fine and well balanced that it was soon one of just a few single malts rated ‘Top Class’ by industry experts.

description.data: The exceptionally smooth, clean and fruity taste of Aultmore can be traced to the Foggie Moss. Our water source filters through bracken, gorse and heather purifying the water to the profit of Aultmore’s refined character. Aultmore 21 Years Old is a classic Speyside whisky, aromatic and fragrant in style. Elegant and uncomplicated, grassy and herbal – with notes of rosemary and thyme.

namePublicLong.data: Aultmore 21 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky 46% 75Cl/750Ml

tastingNotesText.data: Ethereal summer nights, gloaming air tinged with fruity olive oil and rosemary, mingle with sugared almonds and ground coffee with a delicious, smooth mouthful of ogen melon and citrus. Tempered with toasted cereals and a velvety sweetness with soft melon and cereal hues.

description.data: DEWAR'S 15 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky, created by Dewar's master blender Stephanie Macleod, has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks and, once blended, put back into specially selected oak casks to marry for greater smoothness and a longer, lingering finish. One family - over 150 years of rum-making expertise.

These whiskies are crafted using the DEWAR'S oak marrying ageing process. Pioneered by DEWAR'S in 1899, it involves returning the hand-crafted blend to vintage oak casks for further maturation. The result is a smoother taste with a long, lingering finish; a taste that wins medals and applause, making DEWAR'S the world's most awarded blended Scotch.

description.data: Dewar's The Signature 25 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky was created by the eponymous Dewar family. Over 40 of the finest grain and single malt whiskies aged at least 25 years and older are blended together and then filled into the specially selected oak casks to begin the six month long double-aging process. In an extra step unique to the new 25-Year-Old expression, the whisky was then filled into a set of freshly disgorged Royal Brackla casks for an extra period of finishing.

namePublicLong.data: DewarS The Signature 25 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky 40% 70Cl/700Ml

tastingNotesText.data: Dewar's The Signature 25 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky is a well refined whisky. On the palate, expect sweet and nutty flavors reminiscent of creamy vanilla and heather honey. Being finished in Royal Brackla® whisky casks bestows on it a sweet, velvety note on the long finish.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

Dewar’s The Signature 25 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky
Scotch liquor that is double aged and finished in Royal Brackla casks for extra smoothness
Featuring flavor notes of heather honey, cream and nuts for a seamlessly refined whisky
The process ensures that all the flavors from the component parts are given time to intertwine together for a ridiculously smooth Scotch alcohol
Winner of the gold at the 2021 International Wine & Spirits Challenge

pictureTypeCode.description: Link to a file containing a visual representation of the product.

brandHighlight.data:
GREY GOOSE Vodka is created in France, a country renowned for its craftsmanship, epicurean traditions and spirit-making heritage. The French have a deeply ingrained culture of terroir - identifying the ideal combination of quality food and drink ingredients with people, process and place. Therefore, they have an innate understanding of how to get the best out of the best. Francois Thibault, the creator of GREY GOOSE, was inspired by his training as a Cognac cellar master and created a vodka designed to express the true taste and character of the ingredients. Francois still oversees every step of the unique journey from field to bottle.
GREY GOOSE Vodka is 100% traceable from crop to cork. Every step, from harvest to milling to distillation to bottling, using the traditions of the Maitre de Chai. Some of our farmers have worked the land going back 11 generations. Only two ingredients are used: single-origin Picardie winter wheat and natural spring water.  The inside of every bottle is washed once with GREY GOOSE, so it’s the only liquid ever touching the bottle.

description.data: Grey Goose Vodka is a premium vodka, born of an extraordinary passion for spirit-making. It is created using only the finest French ingredients – the highest-grade wheat and pristine limestone-filtered spring water. It is a spirit of uncommon brilliance, unrivaled craftsmanship and signature smoothness and is an excellent choice as a gift.

tastingNotesText.data: Grey Goose Vodka has an exquisite clear, fresh and elegantly aromatic taste. This is a premium vodka of unparalleled smoothness and exceptional taste, with subtle hints of almond and a long, satisfying finish.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

GREY GOOSE Vodka
A high quality hard liquor that allows you to effortlessly enjoy on any occasion when you want an exquisitely flavorful experience
Combining the best ingredients from France, such as soft winter wheat and Gensac spring water to deliver a delicate and floral aroma
80 proof vodka that is distilled only once to preserve the integrity of the taste
Extraordinary vodka with a sweet, round palette and a bold, toffee finish

flavorStatement.data: Grey Goose Vodka has an exquisite clear, fresh and elegantly aromatic taste. This is a premium vodka of unparalleled smoothness and exceptional taste, with subtle hints of almond and a long, satisfying finish.

description.data: DEWAR'S 15 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky, created by Dewar's master blender Stephanie Macleod, has been matured in sherry and bourbon casks and, once blended, put back into specially selected oak casks to marry for greater smoothness and a longer, lingering finish. brandHighlight.data: February 4, 1862. The Bacardí family, led by Don Facundo Bacardí Massó, buy a distillery in Santiago de Cuba. They throw away the rule book and make their own unique blends with a revolutionary rum-making process that would change the way rum was made forever. One family - over 150 years of rum-making expertise.

description.data: Introduced in 1995, BACARDÍ Limon - the first BACARDÍ Flavored Rum – is named after the Spanish word for lemon. BACARDÍ Limon is a unique blend of BACARDÍ Rum infused with an artful combination of all-natural lemon, lime and grapefruit essences.

tastingNotesText.data: Fresh, crisp citrus aromas and a robust full citrus taste from a blend of lemon, lime and grapefruit.

text.data: teeling, irish whiskey, irish whisky, dublin whiskey, dublin whisky, single grain

brandHighlight.data:
Whiskey-making and entrepreneurship has been in the Teeling genes as far back as 1782, when Walter Teeling set up a small craft distillery on Marrowbone Lane, Dublin 8. Right back in the heart of the Liberties district of Dublin city, Jack and Stephen Teeling, the latest generation of whiskey makers, set up the Teeling Whiskey Company in 2012. In March 2015 they opened the Teeling Whiskey Distillery, the first new distillery in Dublin in over 125 years, and just a stone’s throw from their ancestral distillery, right in the heart of the Golden Triangle, the historic distilling district of the city.
With one eye on the past, but looking to the future, Teeling is the new generation of Dublin distillers. The team approaches their craft with a respect for generations passed but with the confidence to forge the next chapter of Irish and Dublin whiskey.

description.data: A wholly unique style within Irish Whiskey, pushing the boundaries of convention, at the intersect of where old meets new. Teeling Single Grain Irish Whiskey is crafted using an unconventional mash bill consisting of 95% corn and 5% malted barley that has been triple distilled and matured exclusively in French oak Ex-Cabernet Sauvignon red wine casks from California, producing a truly unique Irish Whiskey

tastingNotesText.data: NOSE: Spice and fruit notes mingle with an underlying sweet nose. TASTE: Strong spice at the start developing into lush red berries and grapes, with drying tannin effect at the end. FINISH: Dry finish dominated by wood and spice.

text.data: WARNING: Drinking distilled spirits, beer, coolers, wine and other alcoholic beverages may increase cancer risk, and, during pregnancy, can cause birth defects. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/alcohol.

Teeling Single Grain Irish Whiskey
Handcrafted Irish Whiskey exclusively matured in French oak ex-Cabernet Sauvignon red wine casks for a unique flavor
Single grain whiskey liquor offers red grape and berry aromas with a silky, smooth, sweet taste and a short, dry finish
Crafted using a triple distilled unconventional mash bill that consists of 95% corn and 5% malted barley
Enjoy this whiskey best neat, on the rocks, or in alcohol drinks like an Old Fashioned, Manhattan or Irish Coffee cocktail

brandHighlight.data:
Maestro Dobel®, Mexico’s fastest growing ultra-premium tequila, is an innovative brand with a distinguished product range. It introduced the world’s 1st smoked tequila & 1st Cristalino - clear, multi-aged tequila, filtered to remove color while leaving sublime notes acquired from aging in new European oak barrels. Dobel® tequila is 100% blue agave sourced from a single estate and crafted in the volcanic lowlands of Tequila, Jalisco, Mexico. Dobel boasts Diamante, Silver, Reposado, Añejo, Humito, Pavito and Dobel 50 varieties.
•  Its founder, an 11th generation tequila producer, oversees every step of its production.

description.data:
A defined and distinct character, Maestro Dobel® Añejo is aged in American white oak barrels. Vintages of the tequila from different phases of the aging process are then combined to yield superior flavor. Best savored slowly on its own, either neat or on the rocks. (ABV 40% - 80 proof).
• Dobel is the namesake of 11th generation tequila producer Juan Domingo Beckmann Legorreta. Dobel Tequila is his legacy, so he oversees every step of its production personally.

tastingNotesText.data: Color: Dark amber with bright golden, coppery tones | Aroma: Toasted oak | Flavor: Wood dominant profile, similar to a single malt whiskey with sweet, nutty and vanilla flavors. Agave and fruit notes are present making this an incredibly complex yet smooth liquid. | Finish: Smooth, long finish

text.data: Innovative brand of ultra-premium tequilas including world’s 1st Cristalino (Diamante) & 1st Smoked Tequila (Humito)

namePublicShort.data: Gran Centenario Rosangel 750 ml

brandHighlight.data: Established in 1857 by Lázaro Gallardo, Gran Centenario® Tequila remains a family-owned business and is still crafted in the highlands of Jalisco, Mexico at Ex Hacienda Los Camichines. The First Maestro Tequilero Lázaro Gallardo is claimed to be the first tequila master distiller (maestro tequilero) in history, as he created the Selección Suave process. By this process, he would only pick the richest, smoothest tequila and blend them together, creating a product with superior quality. This process is still in place while producing our tequila.

description.data: Gran Centenario® Rosangel is matured in American white oak barrels, finished in port casks and infused with hibiscus flowers.

tastingNotesText.data: Color: Full-bodied, clean, bright with an orange-pink hue and coppery sparks. | Aroma: The notes of hibiscus and caramel are followed by the notes of agave, wood, vanilla, flowers, citrus fruits, red fruits, and light tones of nuts and grapes from the port casks. | Flavor: Subtly sweet with a persistent warm sensation. Balanced flavors of cooked agave, hibiscus, wood and nuts. | Finish: Delicate

text.data: Established in 1857, Gran Centenario® Tequila has been carrying Mexican traditions and heritage for centuries.

brandHighlight.data:
Maestro Dobel®, Mexico’s fastest growing ultra-premium tequila, is an innovative brand with a distinguished product range. It introduced the world’s 1st smoked tequila & 1st Cristalino - clear, multi-aged tequila, filtered to remove color while leaving sublime notes acquired from aging in new European oak barrels. Dobel® tequila is 100% blue agave sourced from a single estate and crafted in the volcanic lowlands of Tequila, Jalisco, Mexico. Dobel boasts Diamante, Silver, Reposado, Añejo, Humito, Pavito and Dobel 50 varieties.
•  Its founder, an 11th generation tequila producer, oversees every step of its production.

description.data:
A defined and distinct character, Maestro Dobel® Añejo is aged in American white oak barrels. Vintages of the tequila from different phases of the aging process are then combined to yield superior flavor. Best savored slowly on its own, either neat or on the rocks. (ABV 40% - 80 proof).
• Dobel is the namesake of 11th generation tequila producer Juan Domingo Beckmann Legorreta. Dobel Tequila is his legacy, so he oversees every step of its production personally.

tastingNotesText.data: Color: Dark amber with bright golden, coppery tones | Aroma: Toasted oak | Flavor: Wood dominant profile, similar to a single malt whiskey with sweet, nutty and vanilla flavors. Agave and fruit notes are present making this an incredibly complex yet smooth liquid. | Finish: Smooth, long finish

packagingTypeCode.description: A container having a round neck of relatively smaller diameter than the body and an opening capable of holding a closure for retention of the contents. Specifically, a narrow-necked container as compared with a jar or wide-mouth container. The cross section of the bottle may be round, oval, square, oblong, or a combination of these. Bottles generally are made of glass or plastics, but can also be earthenware or metal. Bottle may be disposable, recyclable, returnable, or reusable.

brandHighlight.data:
Jose Cuervo® is the world’s #1 tequila brand. The 1st commercial producers of tequila maintains quality tequila production from farm to bottle. Cuervo tequilas are crafted with blue agave from the family estate in Jalisco, Mexico and can be savored in Especial, Tradicional and Reserva de la Familia® brands.
• The world’s #1 cocktail, The Margarita, is best enjoyed with Cuervo tequila! Cuervo offers ready-to-drink cocktails under the Authentic Margarita, Golden Margarita, Sparkling Margarita, and Playamar Hard Seltzer brands.

description.data:
Made using blue agave from the family estate in Jalisco, Mexico, Jose Cuervo Especial®  Silver is double-distilled for smooth, crisp, clean tequila.  Its aroma is fresh and clean with hints of agave. (40% ABV-80 proof)
• On the palate, Especial Silver is equally crisp and clean with subtle blue agave notes and a warm and smooth finish. No wonder Especial Silver is one of the fastest growing tequilas in America.  Best enjoyed in margaritas, it lives up to its claim as the original party starter. Jose Cuervo is the world’s #1 tequila brand.

tastingNotesText.data: Color: Clear, colorless | Aroma: Hints of agave, fresh and clean | Flavor: Clean, crisp with subtle agave notes | Finish: Warm and smooth

text.data: World’s #1 tequila brand. Double-distilled tequilas from Jose Cuervo: the 1st family of Tequila.
